titles.title: A resolution providing amounts from the contingent fund of the House for further expenses of investigations and studies by the Committee on the Judiciary in the second session of the One Hundreth Congress.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended).
House Committee on House Administration Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 3/30/1988--Passed House amended. (Measure passed House, amended) Provides amounts to the House Committee on the Judiciary for the expenses of investigations and studies with respect to judicial impeachment. Authorizes the use of such funds for the procurement of consultant services.
